TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StickyNoteControl extends System.Windows.Controls.Control
Public NotInheritable Class StickyNoteControl Inherits Control
public ref class StickyNoteControl sealed : System::Windows::Controls::Control

summary.span: 表示可讓使用者將輸入文字或手寫附註附加至文件的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that lets users attach typed text or handwritten annotations to documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自黏便箋提供長方形區塊的內容會與文字、 影像或其他註解所錨定的資料分開。A sticky note provides a rectangular area whose content is separate from the text, image, or other material to which the note is anchored. 類別和其成員是公用的讓它可以套用樣式，但沒有公用建構函式。The class and its members are public so that it can be styled, but is no public constructor. 建立執行個體與和的類別。Instances are created with the and of the class. 建立自黏便箋時，會將它指定為下列其中一種：When a sticky note is created, it is designated as one of two types: - **文字**自黏便箋有內容可以撰寫和編輯像任何其他的 Rtf 文字區域的區域。**Text** sticky notes have a content area that can be written and edited like any other Rich Text area. 使用者可以輸入，也可以剪下、 複製和貼上內附註和附註和其他應用程式之間。Users can type into it and can also cut, copy, and paste both within the note and between the note and other applications. 映像也可以貼入附註。Images can also be pasted into the note. 一般的 Rich Text 鍵盤快速鍵也會提供。The usual Rich Text keyboard shortcuts are also available. - **筆跡**自黏便箋有內容區域和它可以編輯其他筆墨 canvasses 一樣。**Ink** sticky notes have an content area and it can be edited like other ink canvasses. 例如，可以清除筆觸。For example, strokes can be erased. Tablet PC 或其他適當的硬體，使用者可輸入手寫的便箋。With a tablet PC or other suitable hardware, users can enter handwritten notes. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的使得更強大的方式，來加上註解材料比硬拷貝標記，或使用實體的手寫的便箋。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of the makes it a more powerful way to annotate material than marking up a hardcopy or using physical handwritten notes. 它也是比直接加入，或透過文件的文字可以突顯出更有彈性。It is also more flexible than simply adding to, or striking through, the text of a document. - 自黏便箋可以調整大小。Sticky notes can be resized. - 自黏便箋可以最小化成一個圖示和展開。Sticky notes can be minimized to an icon and expanded. - 最大化時，可以拖曳自黏便箋到視窗中的新位置而不需要變更其錨點的位置。When maximized, a sticky note can be dragged to a new position in a window without changing the location of its anchor. - 要套用的自黏便箋的確切內容會反白顯示，並以方括號標記。The exact content to which a sticky note applies is highlighted and marked off with brackets. - 兩個或多個 「 自黏便箋可以套用至相同的內容或重疊的內容。Two or more sticky notes can apply to the same content or to overlapping content. - 當自黏便箋所錨定的文件內容中發生變更時，自黏便箋的位置將移至已繫結的內容的相對位置。When change occurs within the document content to which a sticky note is anchored, the sticky note's position moves in position relative to the content to which it was bound. - 使用文字自黏便箋，會自動換行。With text sticky notes, lines will wrap automatically. 如果便箋調整大小，視需要重新將換行。If the note is resized, lines will re-wrap as needed. 如果內容延伸下方的附註，則會出現垂直捲軸。If content extends below the bottom of the note, a vertical scroll bar will appear. - 筆跡自黏便箋，與內容超出便箋的界限時，會出現垂直和水平捲軸。With ink sticky notes, vertical and horizontal scroll bars will appear whenever content extends beyond the boundaries of the note. ## Examples 下列範例顯示功能表中的命令可以設定為執行和的類別。The following example shows how menu commands in a can be configured to execute the and of the class. 此範例示範如何讀取[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)]文件到控制，然後啟用 加入使用者建立自黏便箋的支援。The example shows how to read an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] document into a control and then enable support for adding user-created sticky notes. [!code-xaml[DocViewerAnnotationsXps#CreateDeleteAnnotations](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocViewerAnnotationsXps/CSharp/Window1.xaml#createdeleteannotations)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您以符合對應的註解物件自黏便箋。This property enables you to match the sticky note with the corresponding annotated object. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用時，採用參數的型別。When used, the takes a parameter of type . 此命令方法會將游標放在參數所指定的模式。The command's method will put the cursor in the mode specified by the parameter.
